original_text: If anyone has caused grief, he has not so much grieved me as he has grieved all of you to some extent—not to put it too severely.
korean_text: 근심하게 한 자가 있었을지라도 나를 근심하게 한 것이 아니요 어느 정도 너희 모두를 근심하게 한 것이니 어느 정도라 함은 내가 너무 지나치게 말하지 아니하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: he has not so much grieved me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나를 그렇게 슬프게 하지는 않았고

sentences.original_text: as he has grieved all of you
not to put it too severely
